home-page.me: I'm João João Victor Mendes Ávila
home-page.description: With a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and always looking for challenges, I am a software engineer who loves technology with over 6 years of experience as a Software Developer, working mainly with Javascript, Typescript, ReactJS, NodeJs and NextJS.

ui-twitter.description: ReactJS project creating twitter interface and tweet coments window

ui-whatsapp.description: ReactJS project using TailwindCSS to create main web whatsapp interface

exchange.description: ReactJS project using react-chart-2 to create an exchange chart

jsexpert7.description: ReactJS project using Tensorflow to detect gestures and interact with the browser

sales.title: Sales by day of the week

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
descriptions: - Lead quick stock team to send information to the logistics data department, O2O and website, with the aim of centralizing information.
- Architecture - Systems migration to K8S and participation in strategic decisions involving costs related to AWS
- Development of microservices in NodeJS, NextJS and React on the front-end, MongoDB, REDIS and KAFKA.

jobs.title: Mid Software Engineer
descriptions: - Development of internal systems focused on the Front-end using NextJS, React JS, Material UI, Typescript and Jest technologies, following good practices for continuous delivery, load testing, security verification and code analysis.

jobs.title: Junior Software Engineer
descriptions: - Criação de rede profissional com mapeamento de softskills e caminho de desenvolvimento com Inteligência Artificial utilizando principalmente TensorFlow, NextJS, Redux Saga e Material UI, mais de 300.000 usuários e 1.000 empresas.
- Trabalhando com páginas da Web, renderização no servidor, bate-papos com websockets, trilha de aprendizagem com tecnologia de IA e tradução EN (react-i18n).

jobs.title: Trainee Software Engineer
descriptions: - Trabalhando com ReactJS para construir aplicativos responsivos com Material UI e Redux para gerenciar o estado do aplicativo.

jobs.title: Trainee Software Engineer
descriptions: - Talking with clients to understand new features and making sprints using Agile Methodology.
- Working with Ionic, VueJS, ReactJS, Angular JS, Material UI, Integration with WebSockets, Dashboards and Custom Maps(Google Maps Javascript API)
- Working with JAVA, Spring Boot, SQL Server, MySQL and Integration with MaxiPago credit card payment API
- Using Firebase to Auth, Data Base and real-time notifications.
